elements.name: As a PO Curator, I can Delete an Organization with no Trial Records

steps.name: I know which organization I want to delete
I am logged in to CTRP PO application
I have searched for an organization and found the one I wish to delete
I have selected the function Delete Organization
the organization is not referenced as a lead organization on a trial
the organization is not referenced as a participating site on a trial
the organization is not referenced as a Person record Affiliated Organization
the organization is not referenced as a CTRP User Affiliated Organization
the organization is not part of a Family Organization
the system will delete the organization record
